text: Pyrgus or Pyrgos () was a fortified town of a district called Perippia, in Hollow Elis, in ancient Elis. It is mentioned by Polybius in conjunction with Lasion Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Elis Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Pyrgus (Elis)
